name: Karaoke Revolution
synopsis: Turn your PlayStation 2 into a high-end, interactive karaoke machine with Karaoke Revolution, the latest in Konami's line of music video games.  Karaoke Revolution features a varied list of tunes from current hits to yesterday's classics.  With the USB headset, you'll not only sing song, but get judged on your performance--so make sure you're on key.  Take your voice to the ultimate concert venue in Showtime mode.   Karaoke Revolution gives everyone something to sing about.
